name: create-aptos-dapp
description: a starter kit for dapp developers to easily bootstrap a dapp on the Aptos network
author: aptoslabs.com

scripts.build: ./cleanup_for_publish.sh && npm install && tsc && cp -r templates dist/templates && cp -r examples dist/examples
scripts.dev: rm -rf my-aptos-dapp && npm run build && node dist/index.js
scripts.nft-minting:deploy: npm run nft-minting:build && gh-pages --dist template-live-examples/nft-minting/dist --dest nft-minting
scripts.token-minting:deploy: npm run token-minting:build && gh-pages --dist template-live-examples/token-minting/dist --dest token-minting
scripts.token-staking:deploy: npm run token-staking:build && gh-pages --dist template-live-examples/token-staking/dist --dest token-staking
